title: The Pont Neuf Wrapped, Project for Paris [top panel]
medium: top panel of two parts: collage with printed map, pastel, wax crayon, and graphite on wove paper
dimensions:
Overall: 37.7 x 164.5 cm (14 13/16 x 64 3/4 in.)

creditline: Gift of a Private Collector in honor of Dorothy and Herbert Vogel
